# Programming Guide

> Documentation for Programming Guide.

## Subtopics

- [Classes And Structs Docs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/programming-guide/classes-and-structs/llms.txt): Topics available: 39; Classes And Structs Docs documentation and reference.

- [Work with delegate types in C#](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/programming-guide/delegates/llms.txt): Topics available: 5; Work with delegate types in C# documentation and reference.
- [Events Docs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/programming-guide/events/llms.txt): Topics available: 5; Events Docs documentation and reference.
- [Generics Docs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/programming-guide/generics/llms.txt): Topics available: 9; Generics Docs documentation and reference.
- [Indexers Docs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/programming-guide/indexers/llms.txt): Topics available: 4; Indexers Docs documentation and reference.
- [Interfaces Docs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/programming-guide/interfaces/llms.txt): Topics available: 3; Interfaces Docs documentation and reference.

- [Strings Docs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/programming-guide/strings/llms.txt): Topics available: 2; Strings Docs documentation and reference.
- [Types Docs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/programming-guide/types/llms.txt): Topics available: 5; Types Docs documentation and reference.
